text: Simone Signoret (; 25 March 192130 September 1985) was a French actress. She became the second French person to win an Academy Award, for her role in Room at the Top (1959). Signoret won two CÃ©sars, three BAFTAs, an Emmy, a Cannes Film Festival Award, the Silver Bear for Best Actress awards, an NBR Award and a Golden Globe nomination. ==Other websites== * * * *Simone Signoret at The- Numbers.com *Simone Signoret at Find A Grave Category:French Academy Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1921 births Category:1985 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Simone Signoret
